entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as Mr. Tonks and is referred to as 'son' by Hagrid, indicating a familial relationship.

entities.name: dora
entities.description: Dora is mentioned as someone who will send word, but her role in the story is not clear.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Tonks have a familiar relationship, as Hagrid refers to Tonks as 'son'.
Hagrid is aware of Dora's existence and mentions her in the conversation.
